entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
